channel.title: 彭博-市场
channel.description: 这是一个追踪彭博-市场news的种子

item.title: 由于美国的制裁，印度所有炼油厂现在都拒绝接受由 Sovcomflot 油轮运载的俄罗斯石油
item.description:
All of India’s refiners are now refusing to take Russian oil carried on Sovcomflot tankers due to US sanctions https://t.co/2b6Rzvi6I5

— Bloomberg Markets (@markets) March 22, 2024

item.title: 在美联储政策会议召开之前，美国股市出现大量资金外流，导致 S&P 500 指数创下历史新高
item.description:
US stocks saw hefty outflows in the runup to the Federal Reserve’s policy meeting that took the S&P 500 Index to fresh all-time highs https://t.co/a8kTsR3UX2

— Bloomberg Markets (@markets) March 22, 2024

item.title: 与竞争对手一样，瑞典债务催收公司 Intrum 也利用巨额杠杆为其在不良贷款上的赌注提供资金。现在，它正努力应对
item.description:
Like its rivals, Swedish debt collector Intrum took on massive leverage to fund its wager on bad loans.

Now it’s struggling to cope https://t.co/49GBk6c1uv

— Bloomberg Markets (@markets) March 22, 2024

item.title: 经济学家兼作家伯纳德-康诺利（Bernard Connolly）做客《Merryn Talks Money》，将资本主义灭亡的责任归咎于中央银行行长，并解释了如何才能拯救资本主义。
item.description:
Economist and author Bernard Connolly joins Merryn Talks Money to pin the blame for capitalism’s demise on central bankers, and explain how it can be saved https://t.co/l0zE06KZ7h

— Bloomberg Markets (@markets) March 22, 2024

item.title: 桑坦德银行（Santander）表示，经过强劲的开局，其股东今年有望获得超过 60 亿欧元的股息和回购。
item.description:
Santander says its shareholders are on track for more than €6 billion in dividends and buybacks for this year after a strong start https://t.co/ZLw95eYfzP

— Bloomberg Markets (@markets) March 22, 2024

item.title: 上个月，巴基斯坦的发电量降至近四年来的最低点，这将推高电费和通货膨胀。
item.description:
Electricity generation in Pakistan fell to the lowest in almost four years last month, which will push up power bills and inflation. https://t.co/dhgCE38oLT

item.title: 护肤品公司高德美（Galderma）在瑞士首次公开募股（IPO）后首日交易大涨，成为瑞士近年来最大的首次公开募股之一，这也是欧洲股票资本市场亟需的胜利。
item.description:
Skin-care company Galderma surged in its trading debut following one of Switzerland’s biggest IPOs in recent years, a much needed win for Europe’s equity capital markets https://t.co/LNQ7cpBt1b

— Bloomberg Markets (@markets) March 22, 2024

item.description:

item.title: Muzinich 正在扩大其在澳大利亚的私人信贷业务，以从该国 2.4 万亿美元的养老金池中分一杯羹。
item.description:

item.title: 中国最高贸易官员敦促礼来公司加强在中国的投资，誓言为国际制药公司创造大量机会，即使美国正努力切断与中国的关系。

item.title: 伊拉克政府尚未修改预算，以使巴格达能够向在库尔德斯坦工作的国际石油公司支付费用
item.description:

item.title: 据知情人士透露，在香港上市的箱包制造商森美（Samsonite）考虑在美国两地上市的同时，私有化交易的可能性依然存在。
item.description:
Hong Kong-listed Samsonite is keeping the possibility of a take-private deal open even as the luggage maker considers a dual listing in the US, sources say https://t.co/QETpT57gaA

— Bloomberg Markets (@markets) March 22, 2024

item.title: 中国中央政府在年初加快支出，这表明中央政府正在承担更多的融资责任，以支持经济并避免地方政府债务风险恶化
item.description:
China’s central government accelerates spending at the start of the year, a sign it’s taking on more financing responsibility to support the economy and to avoid worsening local government debt risks https://t.co/rOwuKptYKZ

— Bloomberg Markets (@markets) March 22, 2024

item.title: 由于潮湿的天气促使消费者从网店购买衣物和更多商品，英国今年前两个月的零售销售比预期强劲
item.description:
UK retail sales were stronger than expected in the first two months of the year as wet weather prompted consumers to buy clothing and more goods from Internet stores https://t.co/KZedXLQ01a

— Bloomberg Markets (@markets) March 22, 2024

item.title: 澳大利亚立法者在改革储备银行的法案上存在党派分歧，反对党坚持要求政府在出现严重争议时保留推翻政策决定的权利。
item.description:
Australian lawmakers were split along party lines over a bill to reform the Reserve Bank, with the opposition insisting the government retain its right to override policy decisions in the event of a serious dispute https://t.co/JLErmP2M1D

item.title: 受香港上市科技股下跌和一系列令人失望的财报影响，中国股市下跌，并将止住连续五周的涨势

item.title: @johnauthers 说："从利率峰值安全回落对各国央行来说是一项危险的挑战。一些央行正在单打独斗，但大型央行并非如此，它们需要进行协调
item.description:
Coming down safely from peak rates is a perilous challenge for central banks, says @johnauthers. Some are striking out on their own, but not the big ones, and they need to coordinate https://t.co/xXuIRM9AaR

— Bloomberg Markets (@markets) March 22, 2024
